body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting reports about flaky tests or jobs (pass or fail with no underlying change in code) in Kubernetes CI -->

**Which jobs are flaking**:
bazel-test-master (periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master #1314084281143791616)

**Which test(s) are flaking**:
go_test: //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2 

**Testgrid link**:
https://testgrid.k8s.io/google-unit#bazel-test-master
**Reason for failure**:
https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master/1314084281143791616

```
exec ${PAGER:-/usr/bin/less} "$0" || exit 1
Executing tests from //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher:go_default_test
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
W1008 06:36:28.867515  209647 cacher.go:148] Terminating all watchers from cacher *example.Pod
W1008 06:36:34.958950  209647 cacher.go:148] Terminating all watchers from cacher *example.Pod
W1008 06:36:36.960954  209647 cacher.go:148] Terminating all watchers from cacher *example.Pod
W1008 06:36:39.179064  209647 cacher.go:148] Terminating all watchers from cacher *example.Pod
W1008 06:36:42.651246  209647 cacher.go:148] Terminating all watchers from cacher *example.Pod
--- FAIL: TestDispatchEventWillNotBeBlockedByTimedOutWatcher (0.11s)
    cacher_whitebox_test.go:1072: watcher is blocked by slower one (count: 22)
W1008 06:36:43.498316  209647 reflector.go:436] k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/watch_cache_test.go:503: watch of *v1.Pod ended with: very short watch: k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/watch_cache_test.go:503: Unexpected watch close - watch lasted less than a second and no items received
FAIL
```

**Anything else we need to know**:
- links to go.k8s.io/triage appreciated

https://storage.googleapis.com/k8s-gubernator/triage/index.html?test=apiserver%2Fpkg%2Fstorage%2Fcacher%2Fgo_default_test

```


Time | Job | Test
-- | -- | --
08/10/2020, 11:36:02 | periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master | //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2
07/10/2020, 20:49:41 | periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-canary | //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2
07/10/2020, 03:49:04 | periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master | //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2
02/10/2020, 13:06:56 | periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master | //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2
02/10/2020, 10:40:48 | periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master | //staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/cacher/go_default_test:run_1_of_2


```

- links to specific failures in spyglass appreciated

https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/periodic-kubernetes-bazel-test-master/1314084281143791616

cc @kubernetes/ci-signal
